body_html:
This is better asked on stackoverflow in future.

def softmax(a):
  c = tf.reduce_max(a)
  exp_a = tf.exp(a - c)
  sum_exp_a = tf.reduce_sum(exp_a)
  y = exp_a / sum_exp_a
  return y

body:
This is better asked on stackoverflow in future.

```
def softmax(a):
  c = tf.reduce_max(a)
  exp_a = tf.exp(a - c)
  sum_exp_a = tf.reduce_sum(exp_a)
  y = exp_a / sum_exp_a
  return y
```

Now please close this.
